original_text: When he went ashore he saw a great crowd, and he had compassion on them, because they were like sheep without a shepherd. And he began to teach them many things.
korean_text: 예수께서 나오사 큰 무리를 보시고 그 목자 없는 양 같음으로 인하여 불쌍히 여기사 이에 여러 가지로 가르치시더라

sentences.original_text: and he had compassion on them
because they were like sheep without a shepherd
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 목자 없는 양과 같았기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: And he began to teach them many things
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들을 많은 것들로 가르치기 시작하셨다
